Installation

The fastest way is to use Github Pages:

  1. Fork the repository.
  2. Set up your custom domain.
  3. Start blogging.

Configuration

The Noita Theme options must be specified in the variable noita in the global configuration file. Page-level options can be set in the front matter.

Page Options Reference

  • description
  • robots
